cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.emptyDescription: Looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet. Start shopping to find kosher products for your home.
cart.shippingNote: Free shipping on orders over ${threshold} SGD. Orders under ${threshold} SGD have a flat ${rate} SGD shipping fee.

checkout.paymentDescription: This is a demo store. No actual payment will be processed.
checkout.secureCheckout: Your information is secure and encrypted

success.title: Thank You!

success.demoNotice: This is a demo store for the JWB Singapore portfolio project. No actual order was placed.

hero.title: Welcome to the Jewish Community of Singapore
hero.description: A warm haven for Jewish residents and visitors in the heart of Southeast Asia. Discover our rich heritage, join our vibrant community, and experience authentic Jewish life in Singapore.

shop.title: Kosher Shop
shop.description: Fresh kosher groceries, baked goods, wine, and Judaica items available online.

donate.title: Support Us
donate.description: Help us maintain our synagogues and support community programs.

synagogues.title: Our Historic Synagogues
synagogues.description: Two beautifully preserved synagogues in the heart of Singapore, each with their own unique character and history.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Whether you're a Singapore resident or just visiting, we welcome you to join us for Shabbat services, community meals, and special events.

footer.description: Serving the Jewish community in Singapore since 1878.
